quotes.author: Superman
quotes.quote: You are stronger than you think you are.

quotes.author: Iron Man
quotes.quote: Sometimes, you gotta run before you can walk.

quotes.author: Snow White
quotes.quote: You are never too old to be young.

quotes.author: Flash
quotes.quote: Life doesn't give us a purpose. We give life a purpose.

quotes.author: Pinocchio
quotes.quote: Always let your conscience be your guide.

quotes.author: Gandalf
quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.

quotes.author: Hannibal
quotes.quote: I will find a way, or I will make one.

quotes.author: Optimus Prime
quotes.quote: The future is built on dreams. Keep going.

quotes.author: The Minions
quotes.quote: I remember years ago when all I wanted was to be older.

quotes.author: Wolverine
quotes.quote: Pain lets you know you are still alive.

quotes.author: Indiana Jones
quotes.quote: It's not the years, but it's in the mileage.

quotes.author: Jack Sparrow
quotes.quote: Not all treasure are silver and gold.

quotes.author: Forrest Gump
quotes.quote: Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.

quotes.author: James Bond
quotes.quote: Youth is not a guarantee of innovation.

quotes.author: Albus Dumbledore
quotes.quote: In dreams we enter a world that's entirely our own.

quotes.author: Frodo
quotes.quote: It's the job that's never started that takes longest to finish.

quotes.author: Yoda
quotes.quote: No! Try not! Do or do not, there is no try.

quotes.author: Joker
quotes.quote: You can be special to someone but not all the time.
